feed.title: Cornell Cup Robotics Event Blog
feed.subtitle: The event blog for Cornell Cup Robotics

entry.title: Visit of Jim Miner, Regional leader for Teach for America

link.title: Visit of Jim Miner, Regional leader for Teach for America

entry.content: In the week of December 4th, Jim Miner, Regional leader for Teach for America, had come to visit our lab to review the miniBot project with the hope that he’ll make a recommendation for our work to be considered by Teach for America’s president – helping to make the impact of our work even greater.
entry.summary: In the week of December 4th, Jim Miner, Regional leader for Teach for America, had come to visit our lab to review the miniBot project with the hope that he’ll make a recommendation for our work to be considered by Teach for America’s president – helping to make the impact of our work even greater.

entry.title: Professor Schneider’s Talk with potential sponsors

link.title: Professor Schneider’s Talk with potential sponsors

entry.content: On November 17th, Professor Schneider talked with people from IBM Watson’s group that have expressed an interest in the Cup On November 21st, Professor Schneider talked with HRG who have shown interest in sponsoring the Cup.
entry.summary: On November 17th, Professor Schneider talked with people from IBM Watson’s group that have expressed an interest in the Cup On November 21st, Professor Schneider talked with HRG who have shown interest in sponsoring the Cup.

entry.title: Visit of VP of Boeing, Randy Tinseth

link.title: Visit of VP of Boeing, Randy Tinseth

entry.content: Visit of VP of Boeing, Randy Tinseth November 20, VP of Boeing Randy Tinseth came to visit our lab. We are the ONLY lab he came to visit! He showed great interest in the miniBot project and had an interest in product commercialization.
entry.summary: Visit of VP of Boeing, Randy Tinseth November 20, VP of Boeing Randy Tinseth came to visit our lab. We are the ONLY lab he came to visit! He showed great interest in the miniBot project and had an interest in product commercialization.
